description:
In this course you will learn to juggle rhythms with Chuka Chuks. You can get your Chuka Chuks HERE!

The course starts with simple grooves and moves into very advanced grooves. There is a heap of lessons that will keep you learning for months and months.

I've been an internationally touring professional juggler for more than 20 years and playing rhythms with Chuka Chuks is more exciting than any form of juggling I've tried. Hours fly by when you're jamming with music, it's totally fun and totally addictive.

Good luck!
title: Learn to juggle rhythms with Chuka Chuks
